name: Enigma Visual Solutions Ltd
tag_list: exhibition-company, exhibition-design, exhibition-stands-design, exhibition-services, event-company, event-branding, conference-sets
overview:
Enigma was formed 20 years ago and specialises in Event Branding, Exhibition Stand Design, Graphic Design, Graphics Production and Print. Our number one priority is to give our customers the best service and forge long-lasting business relationships.

We would like you to consider us as your visual communications department. We can give you the support and tools that will enable you to incorporate our services into your portfolio with tangible benefits that will enhance your capacity and give an extra dimension to your business.

Enigma is a fiercely service-driven company, and we’ll move mountains to support you and enable you to communicate your brand effectively.

external_links.title: Enigma Offers The Best Event Branding And Production Solutions Proving To Be An Outstanding Event Services Company
